title: Authorised representative duty: verify DoC/tech docs and conformity assessment carried out

article_refs.quote: verify that the EU declaration of conformity ... and the technical documentation ... have been drawn up and that an appropriate conformity assessment procedure has been carried out by the provider;

legal_consequence.verbatim: [Authorised representative] shall verify that the EU declaration of conformity referred to in Article 47 and the technical documentation referred to in Article 11 have been drawn up and that an appropriate conformity assessment procedure has been carried out by the provider.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
